location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprintDimensions: 670 x 1010mm, on sheet 730 x 1060mm

mods.abstract: Map of the Bahrain Petroleum Company (BAPCO) Awali Camp [accommodation township], Bahrain, produced by the Bahrain Petroleum Company.The map shows roads, the perimeter of the camp, accommodation, garages, hospital and medical facilities, water supply installations, recreational facilities, and related buildings.
